news.title: Texposium 1.0: AATCC AUST Showcases Student Textile Innovation
news.excerpt: Ten student teams presented groundbreaking research in sustainability, smart textiles, and eco-friendly manufacturing at AATCC AUST's inaugural Texposium, supported by industry leaders.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: Texposium 1.0: A stage where textile meets Brilliance
news.excerpt: The AATCC AUST Student Chapter hosted TexPosium 1.0, a vibrant poster presentation showcasing student creativity and research in textiles. Ten teams presented innovative ideas on sustainability, design, and textile science, with top performers receiving BDT 3,000 in prizes.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: AATCC AUST Partners with Textile Focus for INSPIRATION
news.excerpt: We're excited to announce our Club Partner, the AATCC–AUST Student Chapter, for Textile Focus's Public Speaking Session — INSPIRATION! Their collaboration highlights a shared commitment to empowering voices, fostering dialogue, and inspiring the textile community.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: AUSTEX Shines at BUFT National Textile Management Fair 2025
news.excerpt: AUST secures 4 prestigious awards across 3 major categories at the BUFT National Textile Management Fair 2025, with AATCC AUST Student Chapter leading the charge in innovation and academic excellence.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: AATCC AUST and BTEMIC Sign Historic MoU for Textile Excellence
news.excerpt: AATCC AUST Student Chapter and BTEMIC formalize strategic partnership on October 28, 2025, creating new opportunities for textile students through joint initiatives and knowledge exchange.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: Abir Hossain Honored in AATCC 2025 Student Chapter Awards
news.excerpt: Former AATCC AUST Chairperson Abir Hossain receives prestigious international recognition for exceptional leadership and dedication to textile science education.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: AATCC AUST Student Chapter Recruitment 2025: Welcoming New Textile Enthusiasts
news.excerpt: The AATCC AUST Student Chapter successfully concluded its 2025 recruitment drive with overwhelming response, extending the deadline to March 20th and welcoming a dynamic cohort of textile professionals-in-training.
news.author: AATCC Team

news.title: AATCC AUST Student Chapter Founding Panel Unveiled with Vision for Textile Excellence
news.excerpt: AATCC AUST Student Chapter proudly presents its founding panel, pioneering innovation and sustainability in textile education. Under Dr. Mohammad Tajul Islam's guidance, the chapter sets new benchmarks for excellence.
news.author: AATCC Team
